title: Anywhere / Nowhere / Everywhere
objective: Llegeix cada frase i tria la paraula correcta: anywhere, nowhere o everywhere.
explanation: everywhere ➔ a tot arreu. Es fa servir en frases afirmatives.
anywhere ➔ en qualsevol lloc. S'utilitza sovint en frases negatives o interrogatives.
nowhere ➔ en cap lloc. Expressa que alguna cosa no existeix enlloc.

questions.sentence: There was ___ to sit in the park
We couldn't go ___ because of the rain
I have looked ___, but I can't find it
You can't find help ___ these days
We went ___ looking for the dog
